name: Flame Shells
pages: Blast radius: 9.0$(br)Base damage: 10.0$(br2)$(#ff8c19)$(o)Flame$() shells specialize in damage over time and area denial. On impact, creates 9 sticky flames in a 3x3 pattern. TIP: The sticky flame entities can stack their damages!

pages.text: These flames deal 4.0 $(l)Fire$() type damage every 4 ticks for 80 ticks.
